official_title: A Phase 1 Study to Evaluate the Effect of Food on the Pharmacokinetics of LOXO-783 in Healthy Adult Subjects
inclusion_criteria:
* Healthy status as defined by the absence of evidence of any clinically significant active or chronic disease
* Body mass index (BMI): 18.0 to 32.0 kilograms per square meter (kg/mÂ²), inclusive
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 55 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Females who are lactating or of childbearing potential
* Clinically significant history of any drug sensitivity, drug allergy, or food allergy
